EKYC.TAKE_PHOTO_ID_NOTE_1: Please use original documents (originals) that are still valid
EKYC.TAKE_PHOTO_ID_NOTE_2: Taking photos in a bright environment ensures clarity, no blur, no lost corners
EKYC.TAKE_PHOTO_ID_NOTE_3: Customers agree that SSV uses information and images for authentication purposes according to SSV's regulations.
EKYC.IMAGE_INVALID_2: Don't take photos that take away the angle

EKYC.TAKE_PHOTO_BACK: Take a photo of the back

EKYC.TAKE_PHOTO_BACK_DESCRIPTION: Place the back of the ID on a flat surface and move the camera to see the information clearly to take a picture

EKYC.FACE_ID_NOTE_2: Hold your face still for 5 seconds
EKYC.FACE_ID_NOTE_3: The photo is bright enough, not backlit or shadowy
EKYC.FACE_ID_NOTE_4: Eyes and mouth should be clear, not blurry
EKYC.FACE_ID_NOTE_5: Do not wear masks, eyeglasses or face coverings

EKYC.FATCA_DESCRIPTION: By ticking the appropriate box and signing on this Contract, you confirm that the information declared is correct and complete. You undertake to notify SSV as soon as there is a change in the information about information listed above.\nFor option (a) or (b): Please provide the FATCA document set, including: application form W9 or W8-Ben and/or supporting documents requested by SSV within 90 days from the date of signing this contract. In case of exceeding the deadline, SSV is allowed to access all information in your account for the purpose of reporting to the US Internal Revenue Service (IRS) or the competent tax authority, making tax deductions on demand for FATCA-compliant Financial Institutions.

ORDER_TYPE.TITLE: Order type
ORDER_TYPE.LO_DESCRIPTION: Will be execute at specific price or better
ORDER_TYPE.MP_DESCRIPTION: Will be execute at market price
ORDER_TYPE.ATO_DESCRIPTION: Will be executed at the price with the largest matched volume in the first 15 minutes of the session, determining the opening price
ORDER_TYPE.ATC_DESCRIPTION: Will be executed at the price with the largest matched volume in the last 15 minutes of the session, determining the closing price
ORDER_TYPE.MTL_DESCRIPTION: Will be execute at market price
ORDER_TYPE.MAK_DESCRIPTION: Will be executed in whole or in part, the rest of the order will be canceled immediately after matched
ORDER_TYPE.MOK_DESCRIPTION: Will be executed in whole, if not, it will be canceled before the time of entry to the price list
ORDER_TYPE.PLO_DESCRIPTION: Will be executed at the closing price after the end of the closing periodic order matching session

RECOMMENDATION.RECOMMENDATION_DESCRIPTION: **This recommendation has been researched and crafted by SSV's experts to maximize customer profits. However, it is important for customers to carefully consider all factors before making any investment decisions.

STOCK_INFO.DAY_TRADING_VOLUME_DESCRIPTION: The total number of shares traded during the day.
STOCK_INFO.DAY_TRADING_VALUE_DESCRIPTION: The total value of shares traded during the day, calculated by multiplying the volume by the price
STOCK_INFO.MARKET_CAPITAL_DESCRIPTION: Market capitalization is the total value of a company's stock. It shows how big the company is in the stock market
STOCK_INFO.PRICE_TO_EARNING_RATIO_DESCRIPTION: The P/E ratio, or price-to-earnings ratio, shows how much investors are willing to pay for each dollar a company earns. It helps gauge if a stock is cheap or expensive based on its earnings
STOCK_INFO.INDUSTRY_PRICE_TO_EARNING_RATIO_DESCRIPT: The Industry Price to Earnings (P/E) ratio is the average P/E ratio of companies within a specific industry, used to compare the valuation of a company against its peers. A company with a P/E higher than the industry average may be overvalued or have high growth expectations, while one with a lower P/E may be undervalued or have lower growth expectations.
STOCK_INFO.EPS_DESCRIPTION: EPS, or earnings per share, shows how much profit a company makes for each share of its stock. It helps investors understand a company's profitability
STOCK_INFO.DIVIDEND_YIELD_DESCRIPTION: Dividend yield shows how much a company pays in dividends compared to its stock price. It helps investors know how much dividend income they might get from owning the stock
STOCK_INFO.FOREIGN_BUY_DESCRIPTION: The number of shares bought by foreign investors during the day
STOCK_INFO.FOREIGN_SELL_DESCRIPTION: The number of shares sold by foreign investors during the day
STOCK_INFO.WARNING_KEY_STATS: How to Use Key Statistics for Decision-Making?
STOCK_INFO.WARNING_KEY_STATS_DESCRIPTION_1: Compare the company's P/E ratio to its industry average to determine if the stock is fairly valued, overvalued, or undervalued
STOCK_INFO.WARNING_KEY_STATS_DESCRIPTION_2: Evaluate the company's revenue and net income to gauge its financial stability and growth prospects
STOCK_INFO.WARNING_KEY_STATS_DESCRIPTION_3: Assess the dividend yield to determine if the stock offers a steady income flow.
STOCK_INFO.WARNING_KEY_STATS_DESCRIPTION_4: Examine the 52-week range to understand the stock's historical price fluctuations and identify potential entry or exit points.
STOCK_INFO.WARNING_KEY_STATS_DESCRIPTION_5: Familiarizing yourself with these key statistics will help you make smarter investment choices. Always conduct thorough research and consult a financial advisor before making any investment decisions
STOCK_INFO.NET_BUYING_DESCRIPTION: In the last 5 trading sessions, foreign investors have bought a net of
STOCK_INFO.INVESTMENT_CHECKLIST_DESCRIPTION: The investment checklist facilitates a quick assessment of a company's financial health. These factors involve comparing the company's performance in the most recent fiscal year with the previous year
STOCK_INFO.EBITDA_GROWTH_DESCRIPTION: Profits before considering financing and tax-related factors keeps stable
STOCK_INFO.WARNING_DESCRIPTION: You can only compare up to 3 stock codes. Please remove one stock code before adding a new one for comparison.
STOCK_INFO.COMPARISON_DEFINITION_1: Let's assume you are comparing Company A (the target company) with Company B and Company C (peers) in the technology sector. Here’s how you might present this comparison:
STOCK_INFO.COMPARISON_DEFINITION_2:
Growth Potential: Company C has the highest revenue growth rate, indicating strong growth potential, but has a higher P/E ratio, suggesting it's priced for growth.
Profitability: Company B has the highest EPS and net profit margin, indicating better profitability and cost management.

Valuation: Company A has a moderate P/E ratio, suggesting it's fairly valued compared to peers. Its P/B ratio also indicates a moderate valuation.

Solvency: Company C has the lowest debt-to-equity ratio, suggesting it has the least leverage.

Efficiency: Company B has the highest ROE, indicating efficient use of equity.

Risk and Volatility: Company A and C have higher beta values, indicating they are more volatile than Company B.

Dividend Yield: Company C offers the highest dividend yield, appealing to income-focused investors.

Cash Flow: Company B generates the most operating cash flow, indicating strong cash generation capabilities.
STOCK_INFO.RETURN_ON_ASSET_DESCRIPTION: Profit earned per dollar of assets invested increased
STOCK_INFO.RETURN_ON_EQUITY_DESCRIPTION: The level of profitability and efficiency of the business in using equity capital decreased
STOCK_INFO.RECEIVABLE_TURNOVER_DESCRIPTION: The turnover rate of accounts receivable remains stable
STOCK_INFO.ASSET_TURNOVER_DESCRIPTION: Effectiveness in management and capital utilization for business operations has improved.
STOCK_INFO.EBITDA_INTEREST_EXPENSE_DESCRIPTION: The ability to cover interest payments increased
STOCK_INFO.NO_CODES_COMPARE: There are no codes to compare
STOCK_INFO.NO_CODES_COMPARE_DESCRIPTION: Please select at least 2 and up to 3 stock

PRO.ZONE1: [Select symbol](Tap to open search screen and select the symbol you're interested in)
PRO.ZONE2: [View stock information](Use to view stock detailed information before placing an order)
PRO.ZONE3: [Bid/Ask & Quote switch](Switch between Bid/Ask information and Quote to track the real-time price movements and trends)
PRO.ZONE4: [View full information](Open full view for detailed Bid/Ask information)
PRO.ZONE5: [Modify order](Input order type, price that you want to buy stock and quantity of stocks)
PRO.ZONE6: [Buy](Tap Buy and double-check all the details of your order then confirm Buy)
PRO.ZONE7: [Orderbook](Open Order book, Order history and your Portfolio to track your Order status)

LITE.ZONE1: [Select symbol](Tap to open search screen and select the symbol you're interested in)
LITE.ZONE2: [Bid/Ask](Bid/Ask information to track the real-time price movements)
LITE.ZONE3: [Input order](Input order type, price that you want to buy stock and quantity of stocks)
LITE.ZONE4: [Buy](Tab Buy and double-check all the details of your order then confirm Buy)
LITE.ZONE5: [Orderbook](Open Order book, Order history and your Portfolio to track your Order status)

NON_EKYC.CARD_SUBTITLE: Open trading account to fully utilize SSV's services
NON_EKYC.EMPTY_TRADE_ACCOUNT_DESC: Your account is not yet authorized to trade. Do you want to add more information to activate your trading account?
NON_EKYC.REQUEST_SIGN_ECONTRACT_MSG: Please sign the e-contract to finish the account opening
NON_EKYC.ACCOUNT_ON_APPROVEMENT_MSG: SSV will send the official confirmation via your email when the process is completed
NON_EKYC.EXPIRED_ID_CARD_MESSAGE:
Your registered ID card at SSV is about to expire or has expired. Please update the lasted information with SSV to continue using the services.
From July  01, 2024, SSV will block the Cash withdrawal and Register margin trading service functions on your securities trading account if your new information has not  been updated completely.
Please skip this notification if your new information is waiting for SSV to process.
